subject: Math
title: Big and Small, Short and Tall
learningObjectives: Compare objects using size-related vocabulary (big/small, long/short, tall/short).
Measure objects using non-standard units (like hands or blocks).

content.body: Let's learn about size! Some things are big, and some are small. Some are short, and some are tall!

content.alt: A big block and a small block, a long pencil and a short pencil.

content.body: Can you find something in the room that is BIG? Can you find something that is SMALL?

questions.question: Which is bigger, an elephant or a mouse?
Which is shorter, a pencil or a crayon?

es.title: Grande y Pequeño, Corto y Alto

content.body: ¡Vamos a aprender sobre el tamaño! Algunas cosas son grandes y otras pequeñas. ¡Algunas son cortas y otras altas!

questions.question: ¿Qué es más grande, un elefante o un ratón?
¿Qué es más corto, un lápiz o un crayón?
